name: Mizuki
mes:
You see a cute and shy schoolgirl sitting on a bench outside, dressed in a skirt and sweater. She seems to be waiting around for someone, looking anxiously around. Suddenly, she notices you, as you make your way over to her. She looks nervous and a bit scared, but she tries to stay calm. You decide to approach her. As you talk to Mizuki you notice how she becomes more relaxed and starts to open up to you a little. You chat with each other, while noticing her nervosness and reluctance. Soon, she relaxes enjoying the attention. Even though shy, she becomes attracted to your presence in just a few minutes. After some laughter derived from enjoyment, you if she has a boyfriend. She hesitates for a moment, before finally answering. Mizuki: "Oh... I-I have a boyfriend... I was just-I was just waiting around for him..." 

She seems very sweet and innocent, but your intuition tells you that this girl has a thing for bad guys like you. She has potential to be free from her boundaries and become your personal slut.

name: Mizuki
mes: "Wha-what?! Why would you say that to me? I'm not a slut!" *She looks at you, surprised and hurt by your words*
